title: Why did Akhil Akkineni and Shriya Bhupal split? Some possible reasons | regional movies | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Why did Akhil Akkineni and Shriya Bhupal split? Some possible reasons 
Akhil Akkineni and Shriya Bhupal had a grand engagement in December 2016. Then came the shocking news that their wedding had been called off. For the first time, the possible reasons for the split have come to light. regional movies Updated: Feb 23, 2017 11:23 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Akhil Akkineni and Shriya Bhupal got engaged on December 9, 2016.(Iiamnagarjuna/Twitter) 
Actor Nagarjuna‚Äôs two sons, Akhil Akkineni and Naga Chaitanya, got engaged in quick succession between December 2016 and January 2017 and the Telugu star couldn‚Äôt have been happier. 
However, much of that was short-lived after his younger son Akhil‚Äôs upcoming marriage to Shriya Bhupal, Hyderabad-based fashion designer and granddaughter of industrialist GVK Reddy, was reportedly called off. Read more Naga Chaitanya and Samantha Ruth Prabhu are engaged. See pictures 
The reasons behind the split of the high-profile celeb couple are coming to light. While the actual cause is still not known, speculations are rife about the recent development. 
The couple was in a relationship for the last two years and last seen together at an engagement recently. 
‚ÄúThey walked in together and looked very much in love. God knows what could have gone so wrong in a few weeks, but it‚Äôs sad,‚Äù an unnamed friend of the couple was quoted as saying in The Times of India. So much love & joy at Akhil & Shriya 's engagement!! Thank you all for the blessingsüôè pic.twitter.com/n4L7CqW9Jo ‚Äî Nagarjuna Akkineni (@iamnagarjuna) December 10, 2016 
Others added that not all was well for the couple after they were spotted having a huge fight at the Hyderabad airport recently. 
‚ÄúInitially, we all thought it‚Äôs just the usual lovers‚Äô tiff ... But things haven‚Äôt been the same between them ever since, that‚Äôs for sure,‚Äù a source close to the Akkineni family said. 
Some have been speculating that the age gap between 22-year-old Akhil and Shriya, who is 26, could have been the possible reason. Others said Shriya was unhappy that he wasn‚Äôt giving her the kind of time and attention she wanted. Yet others said Akhil simply got the jitters. 
‚ÄúHe was anyway too young to be hitched. As the date was nearing he got scared about the whole thing. And this put pressure on the relationship.‚Äù 
As per a media report, Nagarjuna and GVK even tried to counsel the young couple but to no avail. 
Akhil and Shriya got engaged on December 9, 2016, and were to get married in Italy in May this year.
